text: Tyasadina kapaṭī puruṣa ra strīharū mōminaharūsita bhannēchan ki hāmrō pratīkṣā ta gara ki hāmīlē pani timrō prakāśabāṭa kēhī prakāśa hāsila garauṁ ta unīharūsita bhaninē cha ki timī pachāḍi pharkēra jā'ū, (tyahām̐) aru prakāśa khōja, ani unīharūkō bīcamā ē'uṭā parkhāla ubhyā'inē cha, jasamā ḍhōkā pani hunēcha usakō bhitrī bhāgamā (allāhakō) kr̥pā hunēcha ra bāhira sajāya hunēcha
